content:
Meeting in 1h: 2021-06-01T17:00:00+02:00

Agenda:

  • Triage
  • Move to new metadata collection
Sorry read up on something from $day_job
Meeting time :tada:
Do we have something for triage before the sync on Thursday? @triagebot end-topic

Does anyone have something to add on the current topic?
React with :working_on_it: if you have something to say.
React with :all_good: if not.
Perfect.
Next up, we plan to move to the new metadata collection and documentation generating lint, written by @xFrednet
We plan to do this in the next 2 weeks. We'll probably close the tree for this for a few hours, since the deployment is a bit vulnerable to changes...
How large is the time window you need for the deployment?
@xFrednet and I will coordinate this, and announce it here, before we start the migration.
I would say 2 hours.
(famous last words)
Sounds possible if everything works out
I'll try to prepare anything that is necessary beforehand, so that the migration is smooth.
Even a day would be acceptable, so fine with me.
We'll also change the lint documentation to use the markdown heading as part of this move. That means that probably all open PRs will have conflicts afterwards
Ouch. :-)
I'll block a day in my calendar for it, but hope I won't need it.
@flip1995 took over the CI integration part ^^
Yeah, and the website changes from rust-clippy#7279 will be included in that move.
So if you want to make suggestions regarding the new website design, please do so in the next 1-2 weeks.
If there aren't any more questions, this was it from my side. Any more topics you want to discuss? @triagebot end-meeting

Does anyone have something to bring up?
React with :working_on_it: if you have something to say.
React with :all_good: if you're ready to end the meeting.

Here is the link to the previous Zulip discussion in regards to the styling: https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/257328-clippy/topic/Styling.20feedback.20for.20Clippy's.20lint.20list/near/240248286
Great, thanks everyone for attending! :wave:
